plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange sometimes too!
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.
🐇 Bunnies love me!

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels love to climb on me!
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.
🍁 I can have leaves of many colors.

plant.question: I am a pretty flower that can be red, yellow, or pink. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a gift.
🌸 I smell very nice.
🐝 Bees like my nectar.

plant.question: I am long and green. You can eat me as a vegetable. Sometimes I am in pickles. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and juicy.
🥪 I'm good on sandwiches.
🌿 I grow on a vine.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and a bright head. I turn to face the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My seeds are tasty snacks.
💛 My color is very cheerful.
☀️ I love sunshine!

plant.question: I'm a big fruit that grows on a vine. I am usually red inside and have lots of black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and refreshing in the summer.
⛱️ I am often eaten at picnics.
🟢 I am green on the outside.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground. I can be mashed, fried, or baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am brown or red on the outside.
🍟 You can make french fries from me.
🌍 I am a very common food all over the world.

plant.question: I have needles instead of leaves and smell very good, especially at Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 Many people decorate me with lights.
⭐ I can be very tall.
🐻 Bears like to live near me.

plant.question: I am a small, red fruit that grows on a bush. I am often used to make jam and pies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍓 I am a type of berry.
🍰 I am delicious in desserts.
🔴 I am red and juicy.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk. You can eat me, and it tastes sweet. My kernels can be made into popcorn. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am yellow.
🍿 I make a fun snack at the movies.
🚜 I grow in fields.

ocean.question: I’m big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of water!
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand at the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am very slow!
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I use my arms to grab things!
🌑 I can change colors to hide.
🌊 I live in the deep sea.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that swims in the ocean and spouts water from a hole on my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🌬️ I need to come up to breathe air.
🌊 I am known for singing songs.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish with white and orange stripes. I like to hide in anemones. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 People like to keep me as pets!
🏠 I live with a stinging plant.
🎬 There is a movie about me!

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, and I walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have pincers to grab things.
↔️ I don't walk straight!
🌊 I can be red, blue, or orange.

ocean.question: I am a sharp-toothed fish, sometimes very big, and known to hunt in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have many rows of teeth.
🌊 I am a predator.
🎬 People are sometimes afraid of me in movies.

ocean.question: I'm flat and round, and sometimes people believe I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms (usually).
💪 I can grow back an arm if I lose one!
🌊 I live on the seabed.

ocean.question: I am a very big and dangerous fish with a long pointy nose like a sword. What am I?

hints.text: 🍴 My nose is used for hunting.
🌊 I can swim very fast.
🎣 People like to catch me for food.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and is known for being very smart and friendly. I can do tricks! What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I communicate with clicks and whistles.
🌊 I love to jump out of the water!
🎪 You can often see me at marine parks.
